00025 template<int size, class T = double>
00026 class RowVector : public Matrix <1, size, T>, public VectorBase<T>
00027 {
00028 public:
00029   
00030   
00031     inline RowVector() {}
00036     inline RowVector(const RowVector<size, T> &rowVector);
00040     inline RowVector(const Matrix<1, size, T> &matrix);
00046     ~RowVector(){}
00051     virtual T *getElementsPointer() const { return (T *) &d_element[0][0]; }
00056     inline T length() const;
00060     inline virtual T getElement(int elementPosition) const;
00065     inline virtual void setElement(int elementPosition, T elementValue);
00071     virtual bool isRowVector() const {return true;}
00075     virtual int getNumElements() const {return size;}
00079     inline T &operator()(int elementPosition);
00092     inline T operator()(int elementPosition) const;
00103     inline RowVector<size, T> &operator=(const VectorBase<T> &vectorBase);
00110     MatrixInitializer<T> operator=(const T &elementValue);
00121 private:
00122 };
00123 
00124 
00125 template<class T>
00126 RowVector<3,T> crossProduct(const RowVector<3, T> &firstRowVector, const RowVector<3, T> &secondRowVector);
00134 template<int size, class T>
00135 RowVector<size, T> elementProduct(const RowVector<size, T> &firstRowVector, const RowVector<size, T> &secondRowVector);
00147 template<int size, class T>
00148 T dotProduct(const RowVector<size,T> &firstRowVector, const RowVector<size, T> &secondRowVector);
00156 template<int size, class T>
00157 ColumnVector<size, T> transpose(const RowVector<size, T> &vector);
00161 };
00162 #endif
